Name: Thalassophobia
About the game: Thalassophobia is a 2D game that combines survival and roguelike features. A desperate struggle for the survival of the crew and battles with gigantic creatures, inspired by the pantheon of Lovecraft's monsters awaits you. Explore The ocean is full of secrets and dangers. Recruit volunteers and supply your ship to give battle to what is hidden in the depths. Upgrade Improve your ship's systems with new equipment, develop defenses, recruit new crew members and delay inevitable death. Craft Gather or craft supplies for attack and defense, use mysterious artifacts, level your chances in the fight against ancient evil.
